description:
Mysteries abound! How does Mask the Rock know all of Jonouchi’s strategies?  How can Jonouchi stop the masked master when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past?  But the biggest mystery is:  How can Jonouchi not know who Mask the Rock is?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 幻の古代竜[エンシェント・ドラゴン]
